answers.answer: I have told the dr and they just check my blood pressure, do ultrasound and say everything looks good. But the spots have been driving me crazy for 2or3 weeks now. Wondering if anyone else has a similar story????
It can be low Iron.  When's the last time your iron was checked.

Do you get headaches? I was seeing spots, getting headaches , and had horrible swelling in my feet and legs. My bp was always fine so they kept shrugging it off. Finally I switched doctors and it turned out I had severe preeclampsia. Have them do a 24 hour urine catch on you and test for protein. Thats how they found mine. I ended up having my son on the 18th, he was 4 weeks early. Trust your instincts, if you dont feel right then that means something is probably going on.
I get the same thing happening to me, i just get dizziness with it and i am also 32 wks. Gonna see the doc on wed about it.

Oh it was 2 appointments ago they said my iron was slightly low but the nurse that called me with results kept saying I wouldn't have symptoms cause its boarderline low. Maybe my body is more sensitive than they thought.
I do get headache and dizzy spells every day also. Maybe I need to push the subject with my dr

question: Im 32 weeks n i have had my blood pressure checked a million times and always normal but im seeing spots. Not when I change position, but all day long. Anyone else seeing spots?
title: Seeing spots????
